name: IntegerTest
description: Unit tests for integer validation in the IntegerTest class.

test_cases.name: testInt
test_cases.description: Tests the int validation with a valid value.

test_cases.name: testIntBeyondMax
test_cases.description: Tests the int validation failure with a value beyond the maximum integer value.

test_cases.name: testIntBeyondMin
test_cases.description: Tests the int validation failure with a value beyond the minimum integer value.

test_cases.name: testIntegerMax
test_cases.description: Tests the int validation with the maximum integer value.

test_cases.name: testIntFailure
test_cases.description: Tests the int validation failure with an invalid value.

test_cases.name: testIntMin
test_cases.description: Tests the int validation with the minimum integer value.
